name: The Bouncies
description:
The Bouncies need to cross the floor without touching it and exit through the portal on the other side.

Your task is to place the right object on the right spot on the floor so that the Bouncies can reach the other side without touching the floor.

  • Original game play.
  • 3 Material Options that determine the distance of the jump.
  • 11 Different objects
  • 150 Different levels
  • 3 Different Bouncies
  • Catch 3 treats per level for gold
  • Replay any level
  • You can skip levels and come back to them later
  • No timer, no fast click
  • You press GO when you're ready
  • Challenging and not as easy as it looks - but you can take your time.
  • 2 Skill settings:
    • casual- the objects behave in predictable ways.
    • expert - the objects are in physics environment and the angle and speed of the jump has a lot more impact.
  • A mini screenshot shows you how you placed the items and where the Bouncy landed on the floor - so that you know how to fix it.

The Bouncies for windows is 95% identical to The Bouncies for Android.

The Bouncies for Windows from Evolutionary Games on Vimeo.
